entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
